casebody.data:
Rhoden, Admr., Appellant, v. Wood, Appellee.

[Cite as Rhoden v. Wood (1990), 50 Ohio St. 3d 607.]

(No. 89-700 Submitted April 4, 1990 Decided April 25, 1990.) Bernard K. Bauer Co., L.P.A., Bernard K. Bauer and Rickard A. Grafmiller, for appellant. Kennedy, Purdy, Hoeffel & Gemert and Paul E. Hoeffel, for appellee.

The appeal is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Holmes, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Sweeney and Douglas, JJ., dissent.
